creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: fountain-shaped; bell-shaped foot with flat-sided basin; central vertical element with small basin at top with pointed spike at center; decorated overall with organic and geometric designs
markings:
Yung-cheng mark and period (1723-1735);
2-character inscription, on edge of larger basin
title: Imperial Candlestick
